data.name: Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo
data.detailed_description:
Discord Server

Click the image to join our Discord server!


About the Game



Welcome to the land of Alchemia, where magic and alchemy meet to create fantastical creatures and allow a few individuals to harness powers only dreamt of! In your journeys through this land you'll encounter foes, friends, ancient knowledge and relics from a bygone civilization, and much more!



  • 35+ different enemies to strategize against and defeat
  • 40+ unique recipes to discover, with over 10 quintillion possible combinations in each run
  • 30+ powerful artifacts to loot and customize your build
  • 15+ detailed events to encounter during journeys
...and Much More to Discover!
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to the land of Alchemia, where magic and alchemy meet to create fantastical creatures and allow a few individuals to harness powers only dreamt of! In your journeys through this land you'll encounter foes, friends, ancient knowledge and relics from a bygone civilization, and much more!



  • 35+ different enemies to strategize against and defeat
  • 40+ unique recipes to discover, with over 10 quintillion possible combinations in each run
  • 30+ powerful artifacts to loot and customize your build
  • 15+ detailed events to encounter during journeys
...and Much More to Discover!
data.short_description: Alchemia is a turn-based strategy roguelike with a hint of puzzle. You'll collect alchemical reagents, building your own personalized combat satchel, and combine them into magical recipes, unique to each run, to battle against outlandish foes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0+ Compatible Card. Not compatible with most integrated graphics cards.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
